name: Little Afghan Princess
description:
It's a digital piece by Mrs M.Heydari as a member of Sepas art group.

Afghan women, no matter how old they are, still have a "little girl" waiting inside them.
Waiting for freedom
She waits for his dreams
To see love,
She wants a hand to caress,
And an eye for praise
But she sees the saddest moments in front of herself
She understands and her world is still gray...

"My Land" is one of the most famous and nostalgic Afghan music made about freedom that has been used in this piece.

It's for Afghan girls, wishing them freedom.
